children.text: It's easy! Place your pick-up order online or using the Taco Galaxy app. Describe the car you're driving in the Special Instructions box when ordering. Drive up to the Taco Galaxy bakery-cafe, park, and stay in your car. We'll keep an eye out for you and bring your order curbside. Or, you can also drive up and call the posted phone number to place your order if you prefer.

content.name: How does Taco Galaxy curbside pickup work?
content.question: How does Taco Galaxy curbside pickup work?
